Home / Issues / Environment / Seal the Deal 2009

Seal the Deal!

Seal the Deal! is a UN campaign calling for a fair, balanced and effective post-Kyoto climate agreement at the  UN Climate Change Conference (COP 15), to be held from 7-18 December 2009 in Copenhagen. In support of  Seal the Deal!, The Global Compact is reaching out to its participants to galvanize global business support for the campaign.



Support Seal the Deal! in the following ways:

  1. CEO Testimonial: Express in 100 words or less why you support an effective climate agreement. All testimonials will be published on this site (see below) and shared with the world’s Heads of State and Government gathering at UN Headquarters on 22 September for the UN’s high-level summit on climate change. Please send your testimonial to  seal.the.deal@unglobalcompact.org.

  2. Awareness-raising: Use your public relations and marketing channels and help spread the word about Seal the Deal! From now until December, place the Seal the Deal! logo on press releases, publications, letterheads and consider putting it on product packaging, as well!

  3. Responsible Lobbying: Instruct government affairs teams and trade associations to lobby governments everywhere vigorously and relentlessly to reach an agreement in Copenhagen.

      4.     Encourage your employees to sign the UN Climate Petition.     


Further Information

  • Seal the Deal Campaign
  • Seal the Deal Campaign Material
  • 26 May Copenhagen Call by Business Outlines Steps for Ambitious Global Climate Treaty
  • 24 May SG Calls for Greening the Global Economy, Encourages Climate Advocacy by Business
